code: import{React,useContext,useEffect}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{UserNameContext}from"../Context/Context";import{InSessionContext}from"../Context/InSessionContext";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Info(){const{userName}=useContext(UserNameContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const{inSession,setInSession}=useContext(InSessionContext);function beginSession(){setInSession(true);}useEffect(()=>{if(userName===""){navigate("/");}if(inSession===true){navigate("/quiz");}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[userName,", you have twenty (20) minutes to finish this test"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You are to answer 30 multiple choice questions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"For every question you would be given options lettered A, B, C, D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"When you are ready click the start exam button to start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Good Luck ",userName,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"info--btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/quiz",className:"info--link",onClick:beginSession,children:"Start Quiz"})})]});}export default Info;
